entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 9:20 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
